Text: PES5 Is probably the best soccer SIMULATION around. FIFA is just a game you said it yourself it is funny. Anyway does anybody have an english version of this game and is willing to seed? A reduced size package would be appreciated.

Yep I agree that PES is not a simulation as such. What I meant is that PES has much more simulation type setup features when compared to FIFA. And no I don't get my information from commercials I am talking out of personal experience. FIFA is a game that once you figured it out gets boring. But the strategic aspect of PES is what keeps my interest.
